posts.post_title: FS: George Brown (Wash.) PSA 4.5 Old Mill**SOLD**
posts.post_content: One of the toughest T206 combos in existance. Only 2 show up in all grades of the PSA Pops, none show in SGC's. Card is sharp and well centered, please email me for scans. $1750 delivered.....**SOLD**
